name: Sports Media 101
overview:
Founded in 2011, Sports Media 101 breaks the boundary between mega news sites and small unreliable fans blogs.
 With a staff of over 100 writers from the likes of ESPN, Sports Illustrated, USA Today and others, Sports Media 101 provides 24/7 obsessive coverage with a small site feel backed by real journalists and a large organization. Designed to provide instant access, Sports Media 101 breaks its network up into multiple sites with dedicated writers, one editor, one team and one sport on each site. Sports Media 101 provides fans with a constant stream of in-depth obsessive coverage without distractions.
